author: pderop
msg: Attempted to fix distribution license files, but these have to be checked.
All distribution license files are now centralized and placed under the release/resources/ dir (like in ACE):
- release/resources/src/ contains LICENSE/NOTICE/README files for the -src distrib.
- release/resources/deps/ contains LICENSE/NOTICE/README files for the -deps distrib.
- release/resources/bin/ conains the LICENSE/NOTICE/README files for the -bin distrib.
Currently, no DEPENDENCIES files are provided from src/deps/bin distrubution files (only the real DM bundles contain DEPENDENCIES files).
Still to be discussed if we really need to include DEPENDENCIES files for distribution archives (-src, -deps, -bin zip archives) ?
